forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 91. Heat index values as high as 98. Southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8pm and 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 72. Heat index values as high as 97. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Boston today, the air carries a sense of anticipation as the day unfolds under a blanket of muted clouds, hinting at the warmth lurking just beneath the surface. The morning greets us with a gentle stir, the downtown buildings cloaked in a haze that softens their sharp outlines. As the sun pushes through this veil, the temperature will rise, flirting with the high nineties, urging the city to embrace the warmth. The breeze will weave through the streets, a playful whisper from the southwest, heightening the possibility of an afternoon shower or thunderstorm. Residents may find the air thick with humidity, as the heat index may feel even more intense, enveloping them in a sultry embrace.

As evening approaches, the atmosphere shifts slightly, offering a slight chance of rain showers between the hours of 8 and 9. The warmth will remain, beckoning those who dare to venture out to savor the last light of day. It’s advisable to dress in light, breathable fabrics – perhaps a simple cotton shirt and loose shorts – to remain comfortable amidst the warmth. One might enjoy a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or seek refuge in a local café, relishing a quiet moment with a good book while the faint rumble of distant thunder lingers in the back. As dusk blankets the city, the prospect of a quiet evening under clouded skies feels almost romantic, inviting an introspective pause before the hustle of tomorrow calls once again.
